title: Astreil.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
Morning Astreil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Hey....
[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
you seem kind of distant Astreil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Well, yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
How did you end up enslaved?
If you don't mind me asking

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
I was, uh
I was always a slave
I was born into this

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
oh, i'm sorry

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
it's not your fault
don't apologize

[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[Yeah I'm trying to escape|Astreil.AddToEscapeQuest]]
<<endif>>
[[Not really...|Astreil.EndDialog]]

body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
....
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
hi
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>

title: Astreil.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
You got anything to talk about?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
No Emma, not really
it's just...
I hear stories of the outside, of being free
every one I hear just makes me angrier
I've never had that
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
....
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
I'll never have that
now that I'm here
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
where were you before
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
...
I don't wanna talk about it
[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Day3.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
hey Astreil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Hi Emma
[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
Hey Astreil
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Are you just talking to me because you pity me
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
Sort of, yes
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
heh
haha
that's funny
you know I've worked these mines before
done a lot of time slaying bugs, mining, and carrying
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
which do you prefer
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
well none of them
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
oh
[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Day4.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
Hi Astreil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Good morning emma

[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Day4.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Emma why don't you tell me something about yourself

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
why, i thought stories from the outside made you angry

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
I don't care, i guess
hit me

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
what do you want to know

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
how about...your parents?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
My parents
uh, well they were the ones that sold me into slavery

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
oh really?
I guess we have something in common
it's our parent's fault

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
they were nice to me and my sister growing up
they always told me the day might come when I'd have you
you know
"go away"

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
ah huh
was that your word for it

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
yeah, I guess we didn't want to talk about it
the day it happened they asked me to get something in the basement
then they just locked the door
till the squad from the bank came

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
ohh
awful
[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Day5.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
... morning Emma
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
...
[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Day5.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
Well Astreil
I told you about my past
I guess it's only fair you tell me about yours

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
...
sure
you wanna know what I did before this?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
what was it Astreil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
I was a Slave catcher

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
a...what?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
yeah
folks like me have good noses
we can track runaways for days
I get fed extra food if I caught one

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
what...what the fuck
did you feel guilty?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Oh yes, guilty as hell
of course, if any got away, we'd be beaten
I just kind of accepted it as my lot in life

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
...

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Rabbits, raccoons, even dogs, they're pretty easy to catch
but foxes, they're tricky bastards
they have techniques, they got a whole system

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
what kind of system?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
oh they do shit like, double back on paths
walk on fenceposts, cross rivers laterally
all kinds of shit, they're so hard to track
fuckin bastards

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
...
sounds like you have a grudge

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
I do
<<CampEventController upgradeBagLevel>>
[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>

body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
..Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
Catch any foxes down there?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>

shut, the fuck up

[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Day7.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
...

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>

title: Astreil.Day7.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
...
You wanna talk

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
sure
how'd you end up here?
did you lose someone you were trailing

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
nah
it was a whole group
about 20 or so runaways

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
20?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
yeah. the rest of the slave catchers had fallen behind
it was just me 
I chased them for probably 5 or 6 days, they kind of blurred together

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
and you couldn't catch them

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
I caught em, they were trapped on the banks of some river
of course, it was 20 to 1, so not a whole lot I could do
they asked me to join them

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
and you didn't

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
I...I don't know what I was thinking
I think I was afraid of getting caught, i knew their chances of getting out were bad
I told them where to cross the river, then I met up with my, uh, "boss"
Told them they went somewhere else
Word somehow got back to me, I'm not sure why he didn't kill me
I guess he wanted me to keep suffering

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
...
you did good there

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
nah I didn't
[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Day8.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
...

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>

title: Astreil.Day8.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
Astreil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
What you told me yesterday
you let 20 runaways go, they're probably free right now thanks to you
You still feel guilty

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
Absolutly
The others I caught didn't get away

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
...
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
some things you just carry forever emma
[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.Day10.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
Hey ...
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
...
You wanna talk about anything?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
...
ok sure
tell me something about yourself
what keeps you going?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
what keeps me going?
...
I don't have an answer to that
misplaced optimism?
what about you

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_silent>>
I think I'm too afraid of death to embrace it
so I'm stuck in the weird middle part
between unbirth and unlife
so, fear, I guess

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer astreil_default_talking>>
fair enough
[[....|Astreil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Astreil.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Astreil>>
Escape? Here? You have a plan?
I'll help you, whatever it takes

title: Astreil.EndDialog
body: Bye
